name: UnifiedAttribute
description: A unified attribute for the Continuous Slide (Design 1)

content.name: x
content.description:
the X position of the part
default: 0.0

content.name: y
content.description:
the Y position of the part
default: 0.0

content.name: angle
content.description:
the angle of the part
default: 0.0

content.name: width
content.description:
the width of the part
default: 10.0

content.name: height
content.description:
the height of the part
default: 100.0

content.name: handle_height_percentage
content.description:
the hight of the slide's handle as a percentage of the total height of the slide
default: 0.1

content.name: active
content.description:
whether the part should be interactable or not
default: true

content.name: reset_value
content.description:
the position which the handle will return to when the part is double-clicked. If no value is provided, the resetting functionality will not be active
default: -none-

content.name: style_backing
content.description:
the colour of the backing rectangle
default: {r:0.9, g:0.9, b:0.9, a:1.0}

content.name: style_handle
content.description:
the colour of the handle rectangle
default: {r:0.8, g:0.8, b:0.8, a:1.0}
